thread.section_title: Hudson Reed USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hudson Reed USA | usa.hudsonreed.com
thread.title: Ed Dobbs
thread.title_full: Hudson Reed USA reviewed by Ed Dobbs

author: Ed Dobbs
title: Ed Dobbs
text: I purchased a towel warmer and couldn't be happier with my choice. It arrived in a very timely manner and in perfect condition. It was missing the caps to cover the mounting brackets, but these were replaced very quickly and without any hesitation. Thank you so much for your great service, products and support.
